item.title: Reference in for range
item.description: Got pinched by a bug in the for range loop in my code. Let me describe it, so others can avoid it. Principle: Avoid taking a reference of the local variable in the for range, and store it. Inside the for range it is to keep in mind that if you are taking the reference of the assigned variable and storing it in another structure. It can give unexpected results.
